item.description:
**All-Chinese setting, but everyone is bilingual with English**

6:30 pm - Meditation (Ch'an Buddhist tradition)
7:00 pm - Vegan buffet ($10 with advanced reservation)
7:45 p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion (could go on for 75 minutes)
Please do NOT come for the dinner if you are NOT staying for the conversation afterwards. The temple considers that rude!

Dharma With Dinner, Friday evening program at the temple. We are gearing up to start another season of DWD, restarting Friday evening, March 22nd, with a talk on "Happiness and Peace" (Buddhism is about avoiding suffering).

Talks help us notice our suffering, then become aware of the root causes of suffering so we can free ourselves from our obstacles.

Cost (Include vegan buffet dinner)
PLEASE BRING CASH ONLY.
GBBCC is unable to honor your Credit Cards!!!

$10 if you register in advance - $12 if you do NOT register in advance by e-mail with GBBCCDWD@Yahoo.com.
Deadline is noon of the day of the event.

Adult Non-student registered in advance (a) with Marjorie (b) at GBBCCDWD@Yahoo.com AND (c) with this Meetup: $10

Student with ID Registered in advance with Marjorie AND with this Meetup: $5 (student ID required for the $5 half price)

PLEASE BRING CASH ONLY.
GBBCC is unable to honor your Credit Cards!!!
item.name: Dharma with Dinner - 22 March - GBBCC - with buffet
